Text: Manga Bible (新約聖書 , Shinyaku Seisho ) is a five-volume manga series based on the Christian Bible created under the direction of the non-profit organization Next, a group formed by people from the manga industry.

Text: Manga Bible (series):  Each book is adapted from the Bible by Hidenori Kumai.

<Text: Manga Bible (series):  "Manga Mutiny" (2008, 2009) begins in Genesis and ends in Exodus.>

Text: Manga Bible (series):  "Manga Melech" (2010) picks up where "Manga Mutiny" left off and continues into the reign of David.

Text: Manga Bible (series):  The fifth, and currently final book, "Manga Messengers" (2011) addresses events starting with the reign of King Solomon and takes stories from several of the major and minor prophets, and the Book of Esther and concludes with anticipation of a messiah.
